adv: It is easy to use and very expressive. You can easily understand what the charts mean.
disadv: When you consider more aspects, the visualization sometimes is hard to read, since the bar is too thin and the circle is too small. Moreover, when you move the mouse to the thin bar or small circle to see some specific information, it is hard to select the thin bar and circle.
comment: Is it possible to add functions of zoom in and out? This would be helpful to resolve the disadvantages that I mentioned above.
